document.full_text: a panel of psychiatrists who studied the medical records of bruce e. ivins found that the f.b.i.'s case that he mailed the anthrax letters in 2001 was persuasive.
document.title: panel on anthrax inquiry finds case against ivins persuasive
lines_and_colors: a panel of psychiatrists who studied the medical records of bruce e. ivins found that the f.b.i.'s case that he mailed the anthrax letters in 2001 was persuasive.
